name: Puzzle
description: Puzzle is a timed puzzle game. The goal of the player is arrangement an image from constantly moving in the right panel elements. The left mouse button stops moving elements, the player must decide within just 1 second where is the right spot of selected puzzle. Wrong choice hides the element, good one leaves it on the board. In game help is available in a form of small picture, although only for 3 seconds and it takes 20 seconds from the time limit. Number of puzzles and time limit can be set in the main menu. New pictures and music tunes may be added to game catalogue.
